meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be hypnotized.
meanings.sent1: Her hypnotizabilities were evident during the relaxation exercise.
meanings.sent2: The hypnotizabilities of the participants varied greatly.
meanings.sent3: His hypnotizabilities made him the star of the hypnosis show.
meanings.sent4: The hypnotizabilities of the group were like a spectrum of colors.
meanings.sent5: The therapist carefully assessed her hypnotizabilities before the session.

meanings.sent1: The hypnotizabilities of the patients surprised the doctor.
meanings.sent2: Some people have higher hypnotizabilities than others.
meanings.sent3: His lack of hypnotizabilities led to an interesting conversation.
meanings.sent4: The hypnotizabilities of the crowd were like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: She tested her hypnotizabilities by trying self-hypnosis techniques.
